title: Statistical trivia
author: VD
content_html:
Visitors: 4 million
Page Views: 5 million
TIA Downloads: 6,574
Downloads of TIA yesterday: 298


That’s not bad at all when you consider that the main reason I started the blog was to get out of answering the same emails over and over again. There are bigger blogs and there are better blogs, but I like this one just fine. Speaking of which, if you want a link on the Voxologisti, please let me know in the comments here. Also, I’m thinking of putting together a Best Of page, so if you happen to have a favorite quote of mine from either the blog, the columns, or the books, let me know what it is.
